Recommendations: the team highly recommends that faculty counterparts should attach onlu pertinent supporting documents in order to have a comprehensive and wellpackaged documentation
students should not be neglected in the policy planning activity of the instution and of the college specifically as policies that will directly affect them
filing of document in the records management office should be wellorganized and systematic in order that it could be easily found and retrieved when needed
to maintain the standard of the institution the team recommends that different specific guidelines and policies be strictly observed implemented monitores and realized
if budget allows the team recommends that college be provided by a qualified fulltime laboratory technician custodian who will manage and maintain the equipment
short and longterm development plans should be monitored and evaluated
varied social activities may be done regularly to strengthen the harmonious working relationship of the mmsu family
each college must be provided with specific budget allocation for its operation
faculty honoraria for the excess teaching load may be included in the budget preparations so that this could be released on time
